topic.title: 버스에 두고 내린 물건 신고하기
topic.description: 버스에 배낭을 두고 내렸을 때 분실물 센터에 연락하여 신고하고 찾는 방법을 배우는 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 오늘 아침에 7번 버스에서 제 배낭을 두고 내린 것 같아요.
배낭은 파란색이고 옆주머니에 곰인형 열쇠고리가 달려 있어요.
혹시 제 배낭이 들어온 게 있는지 확인해 주실 수 있나요?
네, 지금 확인해 볼게요. 성함과 연락처를 알려주시겠어요?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm calling about a lost item on the bus.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm calling about a lost item | on the bus.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I think I left behind my backpack on the number 7 bus this morning.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I think | I left behind my backpack || on the number 7 bus | this morning.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: The backpack is blue and has a teddy bear keychain on the side pocket.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: The backpack is blue | and has a teddy bear keychain | on the side pocket.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Could you please check if my backpack has been turned in?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Could you please check || if my backpack | has been turned in?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Yes, I'll check now. Could I have your name and phone number?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Yes, | I'll check now. || Could I have your name | and phone number?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: My name is Seojun Park, and my phone number is 010-1234-5678.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: My name is Seojun Park, | and my phone number is | 010-1234-5678.
